scripts.build:node: cd engine && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir build --out-name index
scripts.build:browser: cd engine && wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir browser --out-name index
scripts.ws:build: npm run build:node && npm run build:browser && npm run build:lib && rm -rf engine/build/.gitignore
scripts.ws:test: echo No workspace tests specified for diff-engine-wasm
